description: Unique identifier for a worker-type within a specific provisioner. (cluster)
name: workerType

description: Number of tasks run on this worker type
name: tasks

description: Approximation of the maximum number of tasks running on this worker type for this time range
name: approx_peak_concurrent_tasks

description: Total sequential run time of all tasks in seconds
name: total_sequential

description: The amount of task overlap in seconds
name: x_task_overlap

description: The maximum amount of task overlap possible in seconds
name: max_x_task_overlap

description: The percentage of overlap in seconds (overlap / max)
name: x_task_overlap_pct
